column4: China's Tsinghua to invest $4.7 bln in mobile chips-China Daily
column5: SHANGHAI  Aug 12 China's Tsinghua Holdings plans to invest at least 30 billion yuan ($4.74 billion) in developing mobile chip technology to challenge industry leader Qualcomm Inc's market dominance  the China Daily newspaper reported on Wednesday.

column4: Strong U.S. sales help Cisco beat estimates
column5: Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc  reported higher-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit as strong demand for its products in the United States more than offset weakness elsewhere.

column4: UPDATE 2-Strong U.S. sales help Cisco beat estimates
column5: Aug 12 Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc  reported higher-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit as strong demand for its products in the United States more than offset weakness elsewhere.

column4: US STOCKS-Wall St ends near flat after late-day rally
column5: * Energy shares rally after sharp selloff; Apple also rebounds
Aug 12 Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc's quarterly revenue rose nearly 4 percent  helped by demand for its switching equipment and routers.
